Description: Indicates whether eDiscovery Premium features are enabled for the process. This value is determined by both the customer license level and whether the Premium features toggle is turned on within the case settings

Setting Name: "All people and groups" including unlicensed and on-premises users
"All people and groups" including guest users
"All people and groups" including shared Teams channels
"All people and groups" including departed users
Include indexed items that match your search query
Perform advanced indexing during export to reduce false matches
Estimate unindexed items even in locations without hits
Include all items in folder when folder matches the search query
Include all items in list if any item matches search query
Include contextual Teams and Viva Engage conversations
Include access links (cloud attachments) in messages

Description: This parameter indicates whether encrypted email messages can be decrypted during eDiscovery processes.

Setting Name: Decryption of OneDrive SharePoint Items and Email Attachments
Description: This parameter specifies whether encrypted documents stored in OneDrive and SharePoint, as well as email attachments, can be decrypted during eDiscovery processes.
